channel.title: Help
channel.description:
hi im new to all of this and want to actually be able to play, to get into servers, what do you have to download? or do im 100% lost to all of it and would appreciate help. pm me please
thank you very much :) ~Finity

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Alright, theres a server status section somewhere, click that, then it’ll have tons of servers, all you need to do is click their server, there will be a download link, once u have it downloaded, extract it. Once it is extracted open it up and inside u will see folders sometimes, all you need to locate is th e run.bat or ‘play me’ or ‘click here to play’ etc click that it will load put in a user+pass log in and enjoy.

Read full topic

i feel/sound really stupid lol

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

If you are trying to play/code your own server, you’ll need a client+server. Go to ServerDownloads section, find one you like, download the client and server. once you’ve done so, open up your ‘Server’ folder and search around there should be a run.bat file, double click that, if you get a message, java not recognized then x off, right click the rurn.bat and click edit, you’ll see it would prob say 'jdk1.6.0.____ change w/e is after the last . to w/e jdk u have, for instance, if you have 18, change to ‘jdk1.6.0._18’ and x off, and hit run then it should say server online or something, once that is online, go to your Client folder. Once in there click the run on that, if its an IP changer eaither put in Your ip or Localhost which is ‘127.0.0.1’ which is what most people use, once that is done you can log into your server.

I think this is what you need help with…i hope lol

Read full topic
